definition: the process of becoming worse or less acceptable in quality or condition
a small informal restaurant

pleasure gained from watching the problems and private lives of others

better; more acceptable

a particular style or manner

doing something for pleasure or interest, not as a job
done for pleasure, not as a job
not done or made well or with skill
an extremely large wave in the sea caused, for example, by an earthquake
a film or a radio or television programme giving facts about something

a ceremony at which a crown (= an object in the shape of a circle, usually made of gold and precious stones) is formally placed on the head of a new king or queen and they officially become king or queen
a situation in which somebody gains the top position without competition
a decorated rod carried by a king or queen at ceremonies as a symbol of their power
the long hair on the neck of a horse or a lion

the state of knowing about a particular fact or situation
information, considered as a resource to be used and supplied in industry, rather than producing goods
to be something that everyone knows, especially in a particular community or group
to become known by somebody
as far as you know
from the information you have, although you may not know everything
to share or exchange information, news, ideas, feelings, etc.
to have a good relationship because you are able to understand and talk about your own and other people’s thoughts, feelings, etc.
to pass a disease from one person, animal, etc. to another
if two rooms communicate, they are next to each other and you can get from one to the other
to get or accept something that is sent or given to you
to experience or be given a particular type of treatment or attention
to form an idea or impression of somebody/something as a result of what you see, experience, etc.
to be injured in a particular way
to react to something new, in a particular way
to welcome or entertain a guest, especially formally
to officially recognize and accept somebody as a member of a group

to be the player that the server hits the ball to
to be the person that an action, etc. is directed at, especially an unpleasant one
to exist or to apply in a particular situation or at a particular time
done according to a system or plan, in a complete, efficient or determined way
the activity of learning or gaining knowledge, either from books or by examining things in the world
a particular person’s learning activities, for example at a college or university
used in the names of some academic subjects
a piece of research that examines a subject or question in detail
an academic book or article on a particular topic
the act of considering or examining something in detail
a room, especially in somebody’s home, used for reading and writing
a drawing or painting of something, especially one done for practice or before doing a larger picture
the act of showing or describing somebody/something in literature or another art form, especially a character or an aspect of behaviour
a piece of music designed to give a player practice in technical skills
a perfect example of something
thinking deeply so that you do not notice what is happening around you
the process of going around an area and talking to people, especially to ask for support for a particular person, political party, etc.
the process of asking people what they think about a particular subject
to focus your mind, usually in silence, especially for religious reasons or in order to make your mind calm
to think deeply about something
to plan something in your mind; to consider doing something

that you can touch or feel

considering or including all parts of something

a substance formed by a chemical reaction of two or more elements in fixed amounts relative to each other
a noun, an adjective or a verb made of two or more words or parts of words, written as one or more words, or joined by a hyphen. Travel agent, dark-haired and bathroom are all compounds.

a belief or set of beliefs held and taught by a Church, a political party, etc.

a place where dogs that have been found in the street without their owners are kept until their owners claim them
used to say that since you have started to do something, it is worth spending as much time or money as you need to in order to complete it
it is better to stop something bad from happening rather than try to deal with the problems after it has happened

existing separately from other people, events, etc. when there should be a connection

a large black and white bird with a long beak and neck and long legs, that lives near water but often builds its nest on the top of a high building. There is a tradition that says that it is storks that bring people their new babies.

extreme anger
